articles.title: 1st human-pig heart transplant unexpectedly changed heart's electrical system, research suggests - Becker's Hospital Review

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: A close encounter with a mysterious moon - Phys.org
articles.description: In 1877,  American astronomer Asaph Hall discovered two small moons circling the planet Mars, later named Phobos and Deimos after the Greek for "fear" and "panic."
articles.content:
